info.name: Fasttech Dark
info.description:
Beta version. Styles most of the site except for checkout and support pages.

More screenshots: https://imgur.com/a/hLwFS
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.0-beta.6 - 26/05/2020

- Updated the style in the tickets section

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta.5 - 26/05/2020

- Styled tickets section
- Adjusted the cart page in response to FT's recent changes
- Tweaked checkout pages
- Styled login pages

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta.4 - 13/01/2020

Fasttech updated broke the style on the frontpage. Fixed with this update.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta.4 - 09/23/2018

Styled the checkout pages. Sorry took a while. Ticket pages next.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta.3 - 03/01/2018

Switched to sirv.com for image hosting from imgur. Imgur is blocked in a few countries and as such those images were not loading for some users.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta.2 - 02/28/2018

Styled Fasttech's new instant search popup.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta.1 - 11/08/2017

Made some of the non-crucial information on the forum page darker to make the thread titles stand out more.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0-beta - 11/02/2017
Release

----------------------------------------------------------------------

By SirTimmyTimbit. 
Refer to this FT thread for support: https://www.fasttech.com/forums/-/t/2563941/-/last

data.title: Very nice, thank you very much sir.
